applyChanges

public static void applyChanges(Editor editor)
Apply SharedPreferences.Editor changes. If the code runs on API level 9 or higher, the asynchronous method apply is used, otherwise commit.

applySupported

Returns true if SharedPreferences.Editor.apply is supported.
